SolrCore.description: The name of the SOLR core which stores the index data of the wiki. (1 per each wiki)

SolrHost.description: The hostname of the SOLR server. Default is localhost. It is recommended that SOLR listens only on localhost.

SolrPort.description: The port of the SOLR server. Default is 8983

SolrUser.description: The user of the SOLR server (usually required in multi-tenant environments or if the SOLR server is accessible via internet

SolrPass.description: The password of the SOLR user (see SolrUser setting)

SolrProxyDebug.description: Activates maximum PHP error reporting. DO NOT use this for production but only for debugging purposes.

AnnotationsInSnippet.description: Annotations can be shown in the snippet. This config maps category names to lists of property names. Articles from these categories show the values of the given properties in the snippets (if values exist). E.g. $fsg2AnnotationsInSnippet[ 'Dokument'=>['Abteilung','Dokumentart' ] ]

FacetValueLimit.description: Maximum number of facets values per facet which forces a search field to appear

CreateUpdateJob.description: Creates async index update job after a page was saved. If false, update is done synchronously.

BlacklistPages.description: All pages listed here are ignored by EnhancedRetrieval. Specify prefixed page titles, e.g. Property:Name or Category:People

CategoriesToShowInTitle.description: List of categories which should be shown in the title of search hit

CategoryFilter.description: Configuration for the category drop-down list of the form ['category'=>'label'] The first entry determines the default. The entry with an empty key '' represents 'no selected category filter'

DefaultSortOrder.description: Default sort order. Possible values: score, newest, oldest, ascending, descending

HitsPerPage.description: Maximum number of search hits to show at once on the search page.

PlaceholderText.description: Place holder used in the search box of Special:Search.

ShowCategories.description: Show/hide categories in the facets section
